name: Robin Webb
text: Something happened. You used to make delicious pizza... Now you make half-prepared pizzas. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kamaria
text: Great customer service and a bargain for pizza! I LOVE this place!

name: Cecilio Quintana
text: Great pizza place... build your own pizza for under 10 bucks.... and since your building your own ask for more cheese and meat pile it in no extra charge

name: Dolores Morales
text: Half pizza, build your own pizza, plus a caesar salad.  Fire toasted.  Nice and crunchy.  Also got a brownie that was heated in the pizza oven.  Restaurant very clean and neat.  Nice assorted drinks.  Pure can sugar drinks plus lemonades.  Definitely going back.

name: Darwin J Perdomo
text: I‚Äôve never heard of Blaze Pizza before, but trying it was awesome. It isn‚Äôt as different as other pizza places where you make your own, but it‚Äôs as good! I was glad they had jalape√±os, as some places don‚Äôt carry them! My pizza was mostly ‚Ä¶More

name: Aiden Earle
text: The staff seemed to enjoy working there, friendly and fast. Food was perfectly cooked. Clean.

name: Andre Cheavers
text: Great food, good atmosphere, good music. Service is always fast and friendly. Kat, Jake, and Alexis are always friendly and good to chat with. No better pizza place around.

name: Diana Carlos
text: We show up around 5pm on a Sunday. It‚Äôs pretty empty. The employees just have a generally bad attitude. They barely put any of the toppings on my pizza. I love Blaze and their concept but this place needs better management and employees.

name: Beverly Bueno
text: Fast, delicious, and personalized pizza in less than 10 minutes. Friendly, helpful, and creative foodie associates.

name: Harry Campbell
text: The pizza is really good

name: Tammy Wik
text: Out of #vegan cheese, so I couldn't give it a try. Very tasty without cheese, however, and probably a lot healthier. Definitely a good choice for vegans! (P.S. The vegan chorizo option has some kick!)

name: Paul Bright
text: I absolutely love Blaze. You can't beat the price for what you get, which is a relatively healthy pie with whole ingredients in less than 10 minutes.

name: Joshua Brathwaite
text: These pizza's are great for couples! Get your own or share one! They have a great selection of sauces, meat toppings, as well as vegetables. Whether you select a signature pr build your own with as many toppimgs as you like it's all the same price! üëç

name: La-Kesha King
text: I enjoy being able to make my own pizza. Great place.

name: John Stark
text: I constantly stop purchasing some food in here. I liked the rapid customer service and well cooked dishes. Fantastic work.

name: Stuart Anderson
text: They offer a fantastic variety of fresh food. I liked dining here. The employees are always very friendly, pricing is fair and the place is always well organised.

name: Bren Tom
text: It was not a pleasant experience at the Concord location.  I had ordered a build   my own pizza.  I chose 4 meat toppings and 4 non meat items.  This employee made an unwelcome comment about "isn't this a bit too much?" while he was doing ‚Ä¶More

name: De'Von Falls
text: Loved Blaze Pizza! I'm vegan so finding good pizza Is almost like finding a unicorn. All of there crusts are vegan with a few choices of sauce and an array of veggies! Definitely recommend.

name: Nicole
text:
We went to Blaze a few times when they first opened and really liked it. Not too mention the employees smiled and seemed like they were happy to be working!
ALL of the current staff act like it's painful for them to be there. NO ONE ‚Ä¶More

name: Shana
text: Tried the cauliflower crust and it was good. The crust gets crisper faster than the usual crust so the toppings don t spend the same amount of time cooking. But overall I was satisfied.

name: Shirish Katariya
text: Good place with vegetarian "make your own" pizza options. You can see the live fire on your Pizza... Taste is good... Staff is good, Ambience is good... Will visit again

name: Jared Ho
text: Being able to choose how your pizza is made is great, but especially good when the toppings are good. Service was also nice.

name: Brandon Le
text: They had improv d service recently.  It was really bad before when they barely have available toppings to pick from and gave very little.  Send people boycott then so they became a bit more generous again.

name: Ken Swenson
text: Good pizza baked very fast! Perfect for your lunch break. One price for all the toppings you want. Bakes for about 3 min and its done!

name: Kyle Durham
text: Had a awesome experience in this place with my friend. The food arrived fast and the service is just good. Prices are fair.

name: Christina Gutierrez
text: Cheap, Good, friendly

name: Dr Deviant
text: Went there for the Keto pizza. The crust was good. It was surprisingly light. Couple of problems; the Keto only is available in the personal size and the toppings were sparse. If your unfamiliar with their way of ordering pizza, spend some time asking questions.

name: USMC ROMP
text: Absolutely love this place, not bad pricing, whatever toppings you want, extra cheese etc no extra charge. They're quick too no longer than 10 mins usually 5-8. Not w huge place so seating is limited but I've never seen it crowded.

name: SWITCHBLADE REMY
text:
Amazing pizza place that is super fast and very affordable!
Staff is super friendly and is always welcoming!
They have vegan cheese that tastes exactly like real cheese.
For this reason this is the best pizza place in the area, hands down!

name: Dolores Uesi
text:
Food is superb. Keys is very nice and took time to help me.
Really great and fresh options.
I ordered 4 times extra layers of cheese and they add 4 times extra cheese. You really get what you pay for
Great quality food

name: Lee Thull
text: Make your own or choose one of theirs. Very good pizza.

name: Mike Kidd
text: Went specifically for the Keto crust. The crust was good. Couple of issues, first is the Keto only comes in a personal size, second the toppings were very scant. Needs work.

name: Luis Santos
text:
Made a big online order. Must say these guys are good. Ordered 50 pizzas for my work place.
Pizzas where hot and fresh. Chuck helped me take the food to the car and they gave us napkins forks and knives. Will place another huge order soon

name: josh zamorano
text: came in over the weekend and ordered 15 pizzas with 5 layers of chicken and cheese. Really didn't think they would of accommodated me for this. this is really crazy!!!! they deserve a raise for great customer service

name: Lupe Perez
text: Really good pizza! Service was good, kids loved it!

name: Chubby Kakes
text:
Love the toppings selection, and how quickly the pizza is done. It's always crispy and delicious.
They now have garlic knots, and those are good, too.

name: Taiesha Dang
text: The Customer Service was Good & I wish I could live closer so it could be easier to go back the Pepperoni Pizza we had there was Good!

name: Joe Hinol
text: It's nice to see what goes into the pizza. Great customer service too.

name: jonah blane
text:
We have couple of blaze pizzas in the bay area. It was a little crowded but what do you expect, all blaze pizza I've been to have a little wait time.
Food, service and drinks are amazing.
will be back

name: Estela Ramos
text: They had run out of pepperoni, pineapple, goat cheese! And apart the containers where they put the toppins looked almost empty and neglected

name: Suzanne Robinson
text: This was the best place to catch a late bite...neighboring restaurants were closed, but Blaze was open. I asked for a recommendation and Brendon made a pizza I'd never tried. It was delicious! He and the rest of the staff were friendly and fun. Thanks guys!

name: Clayton Grames
text: It's hard to get more bang for your buck out of a pizza. This is definitely a favorite when we are close. The thicker crust loaded with all your favorite things is the best! And I mean "all" literally!

name: Andrea B
text: So delicious. Great price point. A million options but also some suggestions if customization is overwhelming. Online ordering is a breeze. Easy p/u if you don't want to eat in.

name: ruby Hills
text:
food is always phenomenal amazing bottle drinks. great service.
should hire more people only counted 4-5 employees wouldn't recommend around 12pm ‚Ä¶More

name: Leah Sandacz
text: I was delighted to see they have vegan cheese and chicken. I got those and piled on the veggies. The pizza flattened perfectly in the oven. It was very satisfying. Servers were nice too. Definitely a favorite spot for when I'm in the area.

name: 925Jenny Padilla
text: Food was great phenomenal customer service Teresa was amazing above and beyond

name: C, Bryan Ethredge
text: The employees are great,they smile and look genuinely happy. Good buy, great taste. The same pizza at round table would cost me 3 times the pizza here.

name: Catherine Martinez
text: Pizza made how you want it. Employees r nice and clean.

name: Stingtrap444
text: Good pizza, and good service, highly recommend giving it a try.

text: I love pizza but i don't like my crust burnt.

name: Joe V

awesome job staff..

Staff is always friendly Flakita help me out.

text: Good fast pizza, with some interesting toppings. And they have good GF and regular thick crust that are both bomb. THEY HAVE GOOD BEER ON TAP. Yep. The most hearty fast fire pizza around.

name: Andrew McBride
text: What great service and taste pizza. I like the fact you can watch them make your food and the pizza was ready super fast. Great choice of drinks and nice inside to eat. Its warm outside and the inside is perfect. Music is hip and cool not too loud. Highly recommended

name: Jan Vincent Faustino
text: Awesome pizza that you can customize

name: Daniel Lesnick
text: My work ordered pizzas from here for a luncheon we had. Everyone enjoyed their pizza. Nice variety of toppings to choose from. Pizzas were fresh, tasty and had plenty of toppings. Not quite as good as Round Table in my opinion, but far better than most major pizza chains.

name: Gayatri De
text: Hella vegan options which is my priority. I suggest ordering online so you can skip the line.

name: Kevin Jones

name: Danyel workout
text: Love love  blaze pizza!  The staff are friendly and seem to have fun working.  The pizza and pizza knots are perfect. I want to try the smores dessert next time.

name: Maria Puentes
text: Not a bad pizza and they have a few salad options which are nice. The service is never great.

name: Hector Lopez
text: Fast service. Good food.

name: craig weinberger
text: Pizza always good here. Quick and fresh. Lots of toppings to choose from.

name: Maria Padilla
text: Place is full of dynamics everyone smiling and very happy always saying Sir and Ma'am. Delicious side drinks. Music should be more updated. Clean presentation

name: Adam Ling
text: Great place for unlimited toppings pizza. Have been to Blaze in SF and others here in Concord area. The kids much prefer Blaze compared to the others. Great drink selection. Can be busy but not crowded. TJ's for after meal shopping is convenient.

text: Love Love making my own personal preference delicious! Great Lemonade's

text: First time visitor.  Great concept. One size pizza, 8 signature pizzas and a wonderful build your own option. Add any toppings-all one price. Friendly employees. Pizza is done in a jiffy.

name: Samantha Semrad

name: Mario Martinez

name: Breann Van Slooten
text: This place has potential with better management.  When I was there, the place was a mess and there were many items unstocked on the pizza bar.  They left my food sitting, didnt call me to pick it up, and then didnt have any forks for my salad.  Pizza was good though.

name: Cindy Shehorn
text: Better than you would think. Very reasonable in terms of cost. Super fast service. I'd definitely go again

name: Gjenes Belamide
text: Great customer service, fair price, delicious pizza. Since I'm vegan, I appreciate that their dough and red sauce is vegan friendly. They have Daiya vegan cheese and lots of fresh veggies. I love how the dough is perfectly chewy and crispy. A great spot for lunch!

very impressed.

Great place for family /kids to come build and design their own pizzas

text: I love this place, every time I come I have a really good experience and the employees are all very nice and polite, I‚Äôm always greeted with a smile from everyone, specially Kat,  whenever I come and she‚Äôs working she‚Äôs always so helpful, nice and happy! It seems like she really enjoys her job!

text: Crust was soggy and burned at the same time. Toppings are great, drink selection great. Clean and fast.

name: diana rodriguez

name: Joseph Aguilar
text: Been coming here for two years and have always been the best! Great music! Great food! Great service!

name: Dallas Burrow
text: This place is fun & u get 2 create the pizza of your dreams or choose 1 of the many house specialty pizzas. Artisan ingredients & a fast fired brick oven has your pizza done 180 seconds after its made. Tastiness is 2 die for, & atmosphere ‚Ä¶More

name: David Carroll
text: It's ok...not as good as the other two places, IMO, but the pizza is fairly tasty. Crust is nice and crispy, but they're skimpy on the toppings, unlike the other places...barely any cheese and I like lots of cheese. Price is about the same as the others.

name: Eric Banaga
text: Free coupon in the mail. Staff was super nice and the customization of food was awesome. I questioned how good the pizza would taste since it cooked in less than 2 minutes and it was delicious. Perfect serving size and I didn't feel oily after we ate.

name: Aman Sodhi
text: Very slow service on both the days when I ate here. Pizza quality was good, but there are other better and similar options available in the market that Blaze.

name: John Glotfelty
text: A little pricey but worth it if your looking for something quick and tasty

text: friendly staff second time ive been here and same results!!! pizza always comes out perfect!! store seems to be ran great, every one is happy

text: I love coming here when I want pizza,  they have a gluten free option and love that crust more than the regular crust. Keep up the good work awesome pizza and awesome staff.
